category: Referee Committee Regulations/Article 14 (Categorization of Referee Grades)
contents: Article 14 (Categorization of referee grades) In principle, member sport organizations classify referee grades as follows, but may be classified into separate terms depending on the characteristics of the organization or international referee classification. 1. International referee a. Level 1 B. Level 2. Level 3 D. Others 2. Domestic referees a. Level 1 B. Level 2. Level 3 D. Others [Title revised 2019. 11. 7.]
